overview: AC/DC's second historic appearance at the UK's Monsters of Rock Festival at Donington Park, Derby, England on 18 August 1984.  1) Guns for Hire;  2) Shoot to Thrill; 3) Sin City; 4) Back in Black; 5) Bad Boy Boogie; 6) Rock and Roll Ain't Noise Pollution; 7) Flick of the Switch; 8) Hells Bells; 9) The Jack; 10) Have a Drink on Me; 11) Highway to Hell; 12) Dirty Deeds Done Dirt Cheap; 13) Whole Lotta Rosie; 14) Let There Be Rock; 15) T.N.T.; 16) For Those About To Rock.
title: AC/DC: Donington Park 18 August 1984
